section.name: About OpenIG
section.p: The ForgeRock Identity Gateway is a high-performance reverse proxy server with specialized session management and credential replay functionality. The Identity Gateway supports OpenAM or any existing web access management system. With either method, there is no need to modify the target application or the container that it runs in.

section.name: Welcome Users
section.p: The OpenIG community shares an interest in improving and extending OpenIG software, and in adapting OpenIG to best fit our needs.
You are welcome to join us. Here are some ways to get started.

ul.li: Join the OpenIG mailing list to ask questions, make suggestions, and tell us what you think of OpenIG.

section.p: Looking forward to hearing from you.

section.name: Welcome Developers
section.p: If you are a developer interested in OpenIG, there are plenty of ways you can get actively involved in the community in addition to joining as an OpenIG user.

ul.li: Get the source. See instructions in How to Use OpenIG Subversion.
Make sure you register to join the community, thus also registering to report issues, and describe requests for enhancements.
Participate and discuss your work on the OpenIG mailing list.

section.name: Welcome Partners
section.p: Want to partner with other OpenIG community members to bring solutions based on OpenIG to your customers?

ul.li: Come show off your expertise or post your success stories on the mailing list.
